description: 0007.desc
title: ECLECTIC RESONANCE UPRISING

01.title: UPRISING
description: • Composer: blobdash, Fivda (KodamaSounds)
• Arranger: blobdash
• Narration & Voice: Fivda (KodamaSounds)
• Programmed & Mixed by blobdash
• Produced by blobdash, Fivda (KodamaSounds)
• Mastering Engineer: blobdash
• Used Software: FL Studio 20
• Used VSTs & Samples: Serum, Massive, Vital, Slicex
• About this track:

blobdash: blobdash here! First time collaborating with Fivda and it went really beyond my expectation. While we didn't keep a lot of her initial stems and ideas I believe I managed to keep a lot of the ambience and sound she had in mind, and Fivda really gave me good inspiration throughout the whole process. I really like how the progression in this track ended up, with a very melodic first half and a really "harder" tone through the second half. It represents very well the little story Fivda crafted and voiced. I'm very happy about how the vocals turned out as well! This is my first time submitting a track to KodamaSoft, hope you enjoy it!

Fivda: Time for the UPRISING! This is the big titular song for our brand new ECLECTIC RESONANCE album series. I hope that it will serve as a good example of what you can expect from the volumes to come. It includes elements of drum'n bass, hard psytrance, frenchcore, for a good edgy and noisy potpourri of sounds! Working with blobdash on this was tons of fun- I originally intended to make a solo track, but was out of ideas pretty quickly. blob didn't find much use for the few stems I sent, and the bpm was pretty much the only thing that sticked, lol. I even intended to use a brand new alias for hard EDM, but I think i'd rather use it for a later time when I'll be doing something entirely on my own. I'm the one you can hear in the song, doing the edgy and cheesy narration, nicely processed by blob, who also arranged most of the track. I was mostly on the side giving structure and sound design ideas, while they filled the canvas in. They're ridiculously efficient at producing, and making a song with someone else in the same room as them is always so much more fun than doing it by distance. I also learned a lot of nice stuff that I hope I'll get to use sooner or later!
• Lyrics
This poor girl, she sure wasn't blessed,
From her, they have taken everything
And her appetite shall remain unquenched,
So long as she is idling there waiting
She won't stop, or ever let her revenge go unsatisfied
Until the world knows full well of the force of her UPRISING
Her curse now feels like a blessing to ignore her grief
She now feels alive for the first time since she was born
Smacking her foes down like they're lifeless dolls to play with
Now she wonders, will she have what it takes to live on?
With nothing left of the people she detested,
Her prey was vanquished without a blink
As of now noone knows when she was last spotted
So goes the tale of her UPRISING

• Lyrics
I got a hold of you, it's just me and you
And everything we gon' do, everything we gon' do ya
Oh, the way you look at me is heaven, and you know I could be the devil for ya
You make me wanna talk back, when you're like that I can't take it no more

07.title: PRIMROSE ~  Future of Illusionism
description: • Composer & Arranger: Monkey_Man83 (Team BINGO)
• Programmed, Produced & Mixed by Monkey_Man83 (Team BINGO)
• Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Used Software: FL Studio
• Used VSTs & Samples: EaArturia Piano V2, Roland ZENOLOGY, SI-Bass, VG-Iron 2, Apache Amen Files Vol.2
• Composer & Arranger: VTQ
• Programmed, Produced & Mixed by VTQ
• Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Used Software: FL Studio 21

• Used VSTs & Samples: Vocal - T_VA_124_vocal_phrase_loop_aintnoparty_male_Bmaj = I randomly found this sample and decided to pitch it up. / Horns in the intro - Comes from a private pack by Rohaan (made for DnB but eh) / Bunch of schranz samples from the countless schranz pack by Boris S, Svetec, ASIN. / VEC 4 and 5 (OBVIOUSLY) / Lead - Serum Rave Punk pack

• About this track: This track was originally created for a Sound Voltex custom chart we made with a few friends, but it ended up not releasing. So, I made an extended version! Name is inspired by 1116 - It's a nod to my french friends who helped me decide on the name back in December and with whom I share a big love for 1116. Also the deadline was originally 2022-12-11 (11/12).

09.title: BLADE FURY
description: • Composer & Arranger: MOUNTAIN
• Programmed, Produced & Mixed by MOUNTAIN
• Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Used Software: FL Studio

• About this track: This was originally going to have live guitar recordings, but unfortunately the recordings couldn't happen in time for the release, lol. Hopefully I'll get the opportunity to put together a version with live guitar, because it was really fun trying to compose something for that purpose and it'd be really cool to see that come together.

• About this track: Don’t have much to say. Just keep moving. To whatever person’s reading this: Hope you have a nice day. ^_^
